entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1200 metres near noon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to near valley bottom after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers near noon. Snow level rising to 1300 metres in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023
